Verses: 1 idhinimiththam, Pavulaagiya Naan Purajaadhiyaaraayirukkira Ungalporuttuk Kiristhu Yesuvinimiththam Kattundavanaayirukkiren.
2 ungalukkaaga Enakku Alikkappattirukkira Dheyvakirubaikkuriya Niyamamuminnadhendru Kettiruppeergale;

3 adhennavenil Purajaadhigal Suviseshaththinaale Udan Sudhandhararumaai, Ore Sareeraththirkullaanavargalumaai, Kiristhuvukkul Avar Pannina Vaakkuththaththaththukku Udanpangaaligalumaayirukkiraargalengira Indha Ragasiyaththai Avar Enakku Velippaduththi Ariviththaar.
4 idhaikkuriththu Naan Munname Surukkamaai Ezhudhiyirukkiren.
5 adhai Neengal Vaasikkaiyil Kiristhuvin Ragasiyaththaikkuriththu Enakku Undaayirukkira Arivai Arindhukollalaam;

6 indha Ragasiyam Ippozhudhu Avarudaiya Parisuththa Apposthalarukkum Theerkkadharisigalukkum Aaviyaanavaraale Velippaduththappattirukkiradhupola, Murkaalangalil Manubuththirarukku Arivikkappadavillai.
7 dhevanudaiya Balaththa Saththuvaththaal Enakku Alikkappatta Varamaagiya Avarudaiya Kirubaiyinaale Indha Suviseshaththukku Oozhiyakkaaranaanen.
8 parisuththavaangalellaarilum Siriyavanaagiya Naan Kiristhuvinudaiya Alavatra Aisuvariyaththaip Purajaadhigalidaththil Suviseshamaai Arivikkiradharkaaga Indhak Kirubai Enakku Alikkappattirukkiradhu.
9 dhevan Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Kondirundha Anaadhi Theermaanaththinpadiye,
10 unnadhangalilulla Thuraiththanangalukkum Adhigaarangalukkum Avarudaiya Anandha Gnaanamaanadhu Sabaiyinmoolamaai Ippozhudhu Theriyavarumporuttaaga,

11 yesukiristhuvaikkondu Ellaavatraiyum Sirushtiththa Dhevanukkulle Aadhikaalangal Mudhal Maraindhirundha Ragasiyaththinudaiya Aikkiyam Innadhendru, Ellaarukkum Velippadaiyaagak Kaanbikkiradharku, Indhakkirubai Enakku Alikkappattirukkiradhu.
12 avaraip Patrum Visuvaasaththaal Avarukkul Namakkuth Dhairiyamum Thidanambikkaiyode Dhevanidadhthil Serum Silaakkiyamum Undaayirukkiradhu.
13 aagaiyaal Ungalnimiththam Naan Anubavikkira Ubaththiravangalinaal Neengal Sorndhupogaadhirukka Vendikkollugiren; Avaigal Ungalukku Magimaiyaayirukkiradhe.
14 idhinimiththam Naan Paralogaththilum Boologaththilumulla Muzhukkudumbaththukkum Naamakaaranaraagiya,
15 nammudaiya Karththaraayirukkira Yesukirisdhuvinudaiya Pidhaavai Nokki Muzhangaalpadiyittu,
16 neengal Avarudaiya Aaviyinaale Ullaana Manushanil Vallamaiyaaip Balappadavum,
17 visuvaasaththinaale Kiristhu Ungal Irudhayangalil Vaasamaayirukkavum, Neengal Anbile Veroondri, Nilaipetravargalaagi,
18 sagala Parisuththavaangalodunkoodak Kiristhuvinudaiya Anbin Agalamum, Neelamum, Aazhamum, Uyaramum Innadhendru Unarndhu;

19 arivukkettaadha Andha Anbai Arindhukolla Vallavargalaagavum, Dhevanudaiya Sagala Paripooranaththaalum Niraiyappadavum, Avar Thamadhu Magimaiyinudaiya Aisuvariyaththinpadiye, Ungalukku Anukkiragam Pannavendumendru Vendikkollugiren.
20 naam Vendikkollugiradharkum Ninaikkiradharkum Migavum Adhigamaai Namakkulle Kiriyaiseygira Vallamaiyinpadiye, Namakkuch Seyya Vallavaraagiya Avarukku,
21 sabaiyile Kiristhu Yesuvin Moolamaaith Thalaimurai Thalaimuraikkum Sadhaakaalangalilum Magimai Undaavadhaaga. Aamen.
